Text: Thank you for your work, but this time I'm sorry to say the serial doesn't work: is accepted but then recognized as invalid

KK thanks for the up but it does not work....it does register and then shows 14 days remaining and have to register everytime it is closed and reopened......always says channel is not available at the moment.......any advice.....
did u guys block the program from accessing the internet?
Thanks for ALL the terrific small & big programs kk. For everything you have offered, it must take you quite a bit of time. I appreciate your work to the nth degree!

kk: Oh, Oh, I installed Chris TV and seconds after I connected to the net a window said Dear potential customer why bother looking for a crack when you can get it free from this site [I forget what is was now], blah, blah, blah. That spooked me pretty good and then, 2 seconds later my system re-booted by itself! I almost had a Grand mal from that! And yes I had it blocked with ESET Security [unless I'm doing it wrong] and it found 2 adwares. It also opened [when i started the net again] with yahoo instead of google as my home page. I disconnected the net and after it booted up, I un-installed it with Your Uninstaller and then used regedit. Did I freak out for nothing? have you heard of anyone else getting something like that? That is the first time for me!
